name: Grilled Chicken Marinade
author: Jennifer
summary: Simply the best chicken marinade for any occasion. Works wonderfully on top of a salad.
ingredients: 5  skinless, boneless chicken breasts, thinly sliced
directions: Whisk vinegar, soy sauce, olive oil, parsley, basil, oregano, garlic powder, and black pepper together in a bowl and pour into a resealable plastic bag
Add chicken, coat with the marinade, squeeze out excess air, and seal the bag
Marinate in the refrigerator, at least 4 hours
Preheat grill for medium-low heat and lightly oil the grate
Grill chicken on the preheated grill until no longer pink in the center, 4 to 5 minutes per side
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
